ValidationRule.description: Check to see if the Opportunity Owner is Not CS/SalesOps profile
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(Business_Group__c, 'Core'), NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'De-book Re-book')), NOT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Has_RMA_Replace__c), OR( Owner_Profile__c = 'Apollo: Custom- Customer Services', Owner_Profile__c = 'Apollo: Custom- Sales Operations' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Be sure the Opportunity Owner is a Sales or Renewals Rep before moving it to Closed Won.
